summary: A small lumber yard re-purposed as a rustic cottage
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]The Woodsman's Cottage[/size]

[size=3]This home was created for my main Skyrim Role playing character who is a huntsman and general outdoorsy dude. Its basically an abandoned lumber camp that has been turned into a small but useful player home. It is located just north of Falkreath Hold right on beautiful lake Ilinalta. It would be hard to find a more charming location (If of course you don't mind the rival lumber yard down the road being owned by blood thirsty night walkers)[/size]

[size=4]Some quick info on the crib[/size]

Sits inside of an actual saw mill, just like the one in riverwood. Except this one is far prettier. And shiny.
Has a dock that leads to your own private fishing spot (currently just decorative)
Full crafting support in the basement
Forge? Check
Tanning? Check?
Smelting and Armor/Weapon Improvement? Check and Check!
Ventilation? [size=1]Ugh, well, what doesn't kill you...[/size]
Follower Bedroom in the basement next to the forge. Don't worry about the smoke, think of it as a natural sleep aid!
Upstairs has a full kitchen, a dining room, and the super duper woodsy styled master bedroom Be mindful of splinters

VERSION 1.1

Version 1.1 is identical to the original with one exception. Due to Woodaxsa's suggestion, I have added a small garden and garden shed to the outside of the home. Fell free to check it out. Thanks for the Suggestion Woodaxsa!

[size=4]Please read this as well
[/size]
I love to get feedback. If you have any bug reports to shoot my way, or possible ideas, I like to hear it all. Even the mean things! I'm sure given enough time I will cut you down with my rapier wit.
I will also take a look at any screenshots if you want them posted (given they are family friendly, yes I'm looking at you. You know who you are)

And thats about it. I'll end it with some credits

Skeeter (Me)
Woodaxsa (For the garden suggestion)
author: Skeeter
